definition: mountain pass
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
surname Guan
pass/defile/narrow/confined/in distress

sentences.english: The major set a brigade to guard the pass.
sentences.chinese: 少校派了一個旅把守關隘。

sentences.english: The guide slowly led through the pass's jaws.
sentences.chinese: 嚮導慢慢地領路通過關隘的狹口。

sentences.english: The effect of this is an increase in the number of choke points.
sentences.chinese: 這個設定的結果是增加了關隘地帶的數量。

sentences.english: The carriage left the streets behind, passed the North Barrier, andemerged upon the country road.
sentences.chinese: 馬車把街道丟在後面，穿過北門關隘進入鄉間道路。
